item.description:
Come join lululemon athletica Prudential Center and lululemon athletica Newbury Street as we join together for the month of May.

For the month of lululemon as well as several other run clubs in the city have moved our run club date to Wednesdays so we can run with our friends at Marathon Sports, show our support for our community and get everyone hitting the streets together!

Participating Clubs:

  • South End Athletic Company
  • Marathon Sports
  • Nike Town
  • City Sports

Peter Lavelle from Ultimate Bootcamp will lead our run clubs from the Newbury St Store (337 Newbury St) on a 3-6 mile loop through our beautiful city!
We will follow up with apps and fun at Back Bay Social Club.

Come out, support the city and hit the streets! #onecityonerunclub

https://www.facebook.com/events/131843550341954/

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: One City, One Run Club | May Only Event
